messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on April Spess Junk Oscar have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Spess Junk Oscar, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Oi listen up you faggots. We own the station now. So fuck off with trying to get the spare.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Free armory for all, Free all access for everyone. Welcome to Tide communisum, i am your rasputin

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Power is being fixed, all access ids are being replenished

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Louis Stange. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we accidently gave Louis strange the nuclear codes.... STOP THAT MAN!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the nature of highly sensitive data leaking upon your station we have voted to call your shuttle on red alert for you guys
